fullText: Tony Shalhoub delivers a masterful performance that captures both the humor and pathos of Moss Hart's journey from struggling playwright to Broadway success.
dtliExcerpt: Tony Shalhoub delivers a masterful performance that captures both the humor and pathos of Moss Hart's journey from struggling playwright to Broadway success.
